topicText:
Morbius release date delayed to April as pandemic delays continue ...
Jared Leto's Spider-Man spin-off was supposed to release in just a few weeks.
Morbius delayed 3 months
Marvel movie 'Morbius', which stars Jared Leto in the titular role, has been pushed back three months to April 1st.
Morbius was 3 months late | Movie
“Morbius” is three months late. A Sony Pictures movie featuring Jared Leto as the villain of the famous Spider-Man will be dropped on April 1, 2022.
Jared Leto's 'Morbius' Pushed to April Due to Omicron Surge
Leto stars as the titular villain in the film, which traces the origins of Dr. Michael Morbius. The character first appeared in the Spider-Man comics in 1971, ...
Morbius: Jared Leto's Marvel film delayed again amid Omicron ...
In the Marvel superhero movie, directed by Safe House filmmaker Daniel Espinosa, Leto portrays the character of Dr Michael Morbius, a scientist who turned ...
Morbius will not hit cinemas in January! Sony postpones the ...
We have bad news for fans of the Marvel comic book made by Sony. Although the studio is just winning with the show “Spider-Man: No Way Home”, in the case of ...
Morbius release date delayed to April 2022
Morbius, the upcoming Marvel horror movie starring Jared Leto, has been moved from January to April. Sony Pictures announced the change amid rising Covid-19 ...
